channel.title: How do i make myself owner on 508
channel.description: i need help makin my self owner on my 508 server. everytime i put rights to 3 it resets my account anyone help??

item.title: How do i make myself owner on 508
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

[quote=“Whysoserious, post:4, topic:305026”]You save it, then do compile, once done compiling you run the server, log on, and viola, your owner.

(I Can’t believe I actually said viola)[/quote]lol thanks =)

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make myself owner on 508
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

[quote=“Chosen Pkz, post:2, topic:305026”]its just like making your character rights on 317

Locate the char files, then open the username with WORDPAD, 508 char files are different, they need wordpad to be open correctly…

Just change the character rights to 3, and your done…[/quote]yes thats what i do but then when i log bk on my account has reset and im still not owner

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself owner on 508

item.title: How do i make myself owner on 508
item.dc:creator: @Chosen_Pkz Chosen Pkz
item.description:
@Chosen_Pkz wrote:

its just like making your character rights on 317

Locate the char files, then open the username with WORDPAD, 508 char files are different, they need wordpad to be open correctly…

Just change the character rights to 3, and your done…

Read full topic
